Xia Shaobo

My GitHub|Projects

Biography

I am a PhD student under the supervision of Dr. Ruisheng Wang at Department of Geomatics Engineering, University of Calgary.

Before coming to UofC, I obtained a master's degree in Cartography and Geographic Information System from Institute of Remote Sensing and Digital Earth, Chinese Academy of Sciences (Beijing, China) in 2016. I got my bachelor degree in Geodesy and Geomatics from School of Geodesy and Geomatics, Wuhan University (Wuhan, China) in 2013.

My research interests lie in Mobile mapping, Vegetation mapping and Remote sensing.

Selected Publications

 Shaobo Xia, Cheng Wang, Xiaohuan Xi, Shezhou Luo,Hongcheng Zeng.
Journal of remote sensing,2014,18(6): 1199-1207. [HTML]

Shaobo Xia, Cheng Wang, Feifei Pan, Xiaohuan Xi, Hongcheng Zeng,He Liu.
Forests,2015, 6(11): 3923-3945. [HTML]

[3]A revised terrain correction method for forest canopy height estimation using ICESat/GLAS data

ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, 2015, 108: 183-190. [HTML]

[4]Study on Reconstruction of Bundled Conductors from Helicopter-borne LiDAR Data(In Chinese)

Remote sensing technology and application,2015, 30(6), 1189-1194. [HTML]

[5]Fusion of airborne discrete-return LiDAR and hyperspectral data for land cover classification

Remote Sensing, 2015, 8(1): 3. [HTML]
